forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
